Question: This person no longer borrowed large sums from Puchberg, and made a start on paying off his debts.
Hints: During this trip, this person met a number of musicians and acquainted himself with the works of other composers.
With substantial returns from his concerts and elsewhere, this person and his wife adopted a rather plush lifestyle.
This person died in his home on 5 December 1791(1791-12-05) (aged 35) at 1:00 am.
